describe: Georgia is a country located at the intersection of Eastern Europe and Western Asia, known for its diverse culture, rich history, and stunning landscapes ranging from the Black Sea beaches to the Caucasus Mountains.

cities.name: üè∞ Tbilisi
cities.geographical_location: Located in the eastern part of Georgia, along the banks of the Kura River.
cities.climate: Tbilisi has a humid subtropical climate with warm summers and mild winters.

cities.name: üèù Batumi
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the coast of the Black Sea in southwestern Georgia.
cities.climate: Batumi has a humid subtropical climate with high humidity and significant rainfall throughout the year.
cities.famous_cuisine: Adjarian Khachapuri (boat-shaped cheese bread), Sinori (cheese and dough rolls)

cities.name: üåÜ Kutaisi
cities.geographical_location: Located in the western part of Georgia, along the Rioni River.
cities.climate: Kutaisi has a humid subtropical climate with hot summers and cool winters.
